p: The composition of the stem EO has been rarely studied; in one case from Brazil the main compounds were ( E)-asarone (32.6%) and patchouli alcohol (25.7%), followed by ( Z)-asarone (8.5%), elemicin (6.9%), β-caryophyllene (6.8%), seychellene (5.8%), ( E)-methyleugenol (3.6%) and α-copaene (2.7%) [ 87]. In another case the main compound was still a phenylpropanoid, myristicin (19.3%), followed by propiopiperone (18.6%), β-caryophyllene (11.6%) and δ-3-carene (6.9%) [ 32].
